description: Numbers n such that sigma(n) / d(n) is prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory); A048968:=n->`if`(type(sigma(n)/tau(n), prime), n, NULL); seq(A048968(n), n=1..2400); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Feb 04 2014
mathematica: Select[ Range[2400], PrimeQ[ DivisorSigma[1, #] / DivisorSigma[0, #] ]& ] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 24 2012 *)
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
